name: No. 1 All - Purpose Flour 24  0z. Bag
description:
A gluten-free flour blend for all-purpose cooking, including biscuits, bread, muffins, and gravy. This is the perfect flour for people on a gluten-free diet who love to eat.

Use cup-for-cup in all your favorite recipes. Measure by weight for more consistent results. Use 135 grams per cup in most recipes.

For recipes click on the Recipes tab to the left.

This flour contains:
- No Corn
- No Soy
- No Bean Flours
- No Xanthan Gum
- No Gluten

Each batch is tested for gluten. Our testing ensures that all the flour we sell meets the standard of 10 parts per million of gluten or less.

Ingredients: Organic brown rice flour, white rice flour, sweet rice flour, sorghum flour, organic amaranth flour, potato starch, tapioca starch.

Shipping charges for this item are $11.00 for the first bag, then $.30 for each additional bag.

name: No. 2 Deluxe Pastry Flour 24 oz. Bag
description:
A gluten-free flour blend for baking pastries and desserts, including pies, cakes, and crusts. This is the perfect pastry flour for people on a gluten-free diet who love to eat.

Use cup-for-cup in all your favorite recipes. Measure by weight for more consistent results. Use 135 grams per cup in most recipes.

For recipes click on the recipes button on the sidebar to the left.

This flour contains:
- No Corn
- No Soy
- No Bean Flours
- No Gluten

Each batch is tested for gluten. Our testing ensures that all the flour we sell meets the standard of 10 parts per million of gluten or less.

Ingredients: White rice flour, sorghum flour, organic amaranth flour, potato starch, tapioca flour.

Shipping charges for this item are $11.00 for the first bag, then $.30 for each additional bag.

name: No. 7 Artisan Bread Flour 17 oz. Bag
description:
This unique gluten-free bread flour gives you a light, fluffy loaf of bread like you've never experienced before.  Whether you want a soft, pliable sandwich bread, a traditional round loaf, or fluffy dinner rolls this is the bread flour for you.

This bread has:

- No gluten
- No rice
- No corn
- No soy
- No bean flour
- No xanthan gum
- No artificial ingredients

All ingredients are carefully sourced for quality and safety.  Each batch of flour is tested for gluten and must meet Gluten-free Gourmand's strict standards of less than 10 ppm gluten.

Ingredients: Whole-grain flour blend (stone-ground sorghum flour, buckwheat flour, stone-ground teff flour) tapioca flour, potato starch,  psyllium husk.

Yeast packet: gluten-free yeast, sorbitan monostearate, ascorbic acid

Shipping charges for this item are $11.00 for the first bag, then $.30 for each additional bag.

name: No. 8 Golden Pancake Mix 12 oz. Bag
description:
Every individual has a certain way that they like pancakes to be, and the origin of their pancake desires rest in the way they had pancakes presented to them as a child.  For me, the perfect pancake is about five inches across and a quarter inch high.  It bubbles perfectly after the batter is on the griddle for a while, and when you flip it you see a perfect golden disk, evenly browned.

These are perfect, golden pancakes.  Soft on the inside  with nice air bubbles, the pancakes absorb your butter and syrup like a charm.  These will remind you of pancakes you had as a little kid, but any adult will enjoy them.

You will need eggs, milk and a little vinegar to complete this recipe.

Ingredients: Organic brown rice flour, white rice flour, sweet rice flour, sugar, sorghum flour, amaranth flour, potato starch, tapioca starch, salt, baking soda.

Shipping charges for this item are $6.00 for the first bag, then $.30  for each additional bag.

name: No. 3 Traditional Scone Mix 12 oz. bag
description:
This Traditional Scone Mix makes moist, delicious scones your friends will rave over. They are some of the best-tasting, delicately flaky scones you will ever have, and they are completely gluten-free!

The scone recipe comes printed on the back panel of the bag. You will need an egg, butter, lemon zest and some cream to complete the recipe. There is a vegan recipe alternative as well.  The vegan recipe only calls for coconut cream to complete the instructions.

The Traditional Scone Mix is tested for gluten and meets the standard of less than 10 ppm. (The USDA recommends gluten-free products test to less than 20 ppm.)

Ingredients: Organic brown rice flour, white rice flour, sorghum flour, organic amaranth flour, sugar, potato starch, tapioca starch, baking powder (cornstarch, sodium bicarbonate, sodium aluminum sulfate, monocalcium phosphate) baking soda, sea salt, xanthan gum. 

Shipping charges for this item are $6.00 for the first bag, then $.30 for each additional bag.

name: No. 4 Rustic Boule Bread Mix 8.6 oz Bag
description:
This unique gluten-free bread flour gives you a light, fluffy loaf of gluten-free bread like you've never experienced before.  Whether you want a traditional round loaf or fluffy dinner rolls this is the gluten-free bread mix for you.

This bread has:

- No gluten
- No rice
- No Corn
- No soy
- No bean flour
- No artificial ingredients
- No xanthan gum

All ingredients are carefully sourced for quality and safety.  Each batch of flour is tested for gluten and must meet Gluten-free Gourmand's strict standards of less than 10 ppm gluten.

Ingredients: Whole-grain flour blend (stone-ground sorghum flour, buckwheat flour, stone-ground teff flour) tapioca flour, potato starch, sugar, sea salt, ginger (a natural preservative), 

Psyllium Husk
Yeast packet: gluten-free yeast, sorbitan monostearate, ascorbic acid

Shipping charges for this item are $6.00 for the first bag, then $1 for each additional bag.

name: No. 6 Artisan Pizza Dough Mix 11 oz. Bag
description:
The Traditional Pizza Dough Mix gives you a thin-crust pizza dough much like you would enjoy in a pizzaria in Naples.  The crust is thin, yet firm enough to pick up your slice.  It holds together, yet it's tender in your mouth.  Top it with all your favorite cheeses, meats, and vegetables.

You will need warm water, an egg, and some olive oil to complete this recipe.

This mix makes enough dough for two 12-inch pizzas.

Ingredients: White rice flour, sorghum flour, organic amaranth flour, tapioca flour, potato starch, sea salt, sugar, yeast, xanthan gum.

Shipping charges for this item are $6.00 for the first bag, then $.30 for each additional bag.

name: GF Baking Mix Set of Four
description:
Perfect for yourself or a gluten-free friend, this set of four gluten-free baking mixes is just what's needed to get started baking deliciously gluten-free.

The gift set includes:

- No. 3 Scone Mix
- No. 4 Rustic Boule Bread Mix
- No. 6 Pizza Dough Mix
- No. 8 Pancake Mix


It's a good selection of baking mixes to get started with on a gluten-free diet.

Shipping charges for this item are $11.30.

name: Gluten-free Baker's Kit
description:
The gluten-free baker's kit is perfect for the baker who wants to have as many options as possible for making gluten-free baked goods.  The kit includes:  

- a 24 oz bag of the No. 1 All-purpose Flour, 
- a 24 oz bag of the No. 2 Deluxe Pastry Flour,
- an 11 oz bag of the No. 6 Pizza Dough Mix
- a 24 oz bag of Organic Golden Flax Seed
- an 8 oz bag of xanthan gum

With this baker's kit a baker can make any number of amazing gluten-free items using traditional recipes.  

Shipping is $10.85.

name: Deluxe Bread Baker's Kit
description:
Perfect for holiday gifts, the Deluxe Bread Baker's Kit comes with:

- USA Pan Pullman Loaf Pan with Cover (4x4x9)
- Two bags of No. 7 Bread Flour
- One bag No. 4 Boule Bread Mix
- Wood-handled Silicon Spoon

USA pans are perfect for baking gluten-free bread because of their unique fabrication and design.  Silicon spoons are ideal for handling wet doughs, and three bags of bread flour are more than enough to get a baker started making gluten-free wonders in the kitchen.

name: Petite Gift Basket
description:
Perfect for holiday gifts!  Comes already wrapped in cellophane with a rustic tie and gift tag.  Make a comment as you check out if you would like me to personalize the gift tag.

This Gift Basket contains one bag each of:

- Golden Pancake Mix
- Traditional Scone Mix

name: Gift Basket
description:
Perfect for holiday gifts!  Comes already wrapped in cellophane with a rustic tie and gift tag.  Make a comment as you check out if you would like me to personalize the gift tag.

This Gift Basket contains one bag each of:

- Pizza Dough Mix
- Bread Flour
- Golden Pancake Mix
- Silicone Spatula

name: Bob's Red Mill Organic Golden Flax Seed 24-oz. Bag
description:
Flax seed is used in many gluten-free recipes.  It is used in breads as a binder and a gluten substitute.  It is also used in baked goods as an egg substitute.  Grind the seeds in a coffee mill into a fine meal to use as a binder.  Use whole for a nutty, crunchy, flavorful seeded bread or muffin.

Full of fiber, whole flax seed is a healthy way to add protein to a smoothie or shake.

name: Bob's Red Mill Xanthan Gum 8-oz. Bag
description: Xanthan gum works as a thickener and a binder.  It is often used as a substitute for gluten in gluten-free baking.
